name: HEX & AGON
description:
Submission for the Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1. Made by one person.
Downloadable build and devlog gets updated each day.

Two hexagons fight through a strange world, full of dangerous encounters.
Each has its own limitations, a void that the other one must filll.

Support the dev:
https://www.patreon.com/unicaegames

DAY 1 BUILD NOTE:

ending the level or alt-f4 are the only options to quit the game, whoops
